thread.title: BobA
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by BobA

author: BobA
title: BobA
text: Good, clear and concise. Great to update on newer laws of which we might not be aware. I learned a couple of things. Not applicable to me, but interesting and expands knowledge of laws. Only thing I didn't care for were questions which truly had nothing to do with education but with comments in the material. I suppose they're in there to make you read and pay attention but they don't seem to be a good for any traffic or legal education, just a test of your reading ability. Hope I don't have to do this again but I'd sure use this again if I had to.
